author: toby
title: https://www.cardanoworld.io
description: There is no one combining a cardano-explorer with the projects evolving (project-explorer). There is no single point of entry, no overview.
solution: We want to evolve our services for the community by further developing https://www.cardanoworld.io and https://www.cardanoworld.io/projects.
experience:
We are contentiously developing the blockchain and project explorer https://www.cardanoworld.io, and run the stake pool CASCH.
See PHASE 2.
